links.*: Prose Fragments Following the Lost Tales

wikitext.*:
'''Ethlon''' was a character, possibly one of the [[Solosimpi]], appearing only in the early version of the [[legendarium]] in a prose fragment following ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

Ethlon is never mentioned again, and nothing else is known about the character, except that they spoke "wise words" against [[Fëanor]] and the rest of the [[Gnomes]] that wanted to leave [[Valinor]] after the death of the [[Two Trees]] and the theft of the [[Silmarils]].<ref name=Eth>{{SM|P3}}, p. 9</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Ethlon'' is in [[Noldorin]], according to [[Paul Strack]], but its meaning is unclear.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1275384019.html|articlename=ᴱN. ''Ethlon'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=10 May 2022}}</ref>

Another name for the character was '''''Dimlint'''''.<ref name=Eth/>
